txt_en: In any given moment we have two options: to step forward into growth or to step back into safety.
txt_cn: 任何时刻我们都有两个选择：往前走向成长，或退后走向安全。
author: Abraham Maslow

txt_en: Life is a collection of moments. The idea is to have as many good ones as you can.
txt_cn: 生命由一个个瞬间组成，宗旨就是尽可能多地拥抱美好瞬间。
author: 《爱情限时恋未尽》

txt_en: Don't let other people get in the way of what you really want.
txt_cn: 不要让别人妨碍你追求你真正想要的。
author: 《伦敦生活》

txt_en: It's been my experience that you can nearly always enjoy something if you make up your mind firmly that you will.
txt_cn: 我的经验是，事情只要下定决心去享受，就基本都能享受。
author: 《小小安妮》

txt_en: When I am with you, there's no place I'd rather be.
txt_cn: 只要有你相伴，便无他处可比拟。
author: Clean Bandit, "Rather Be"

txt_en: May your past be the sound of your feet upon the ground. Carry on.
txt_cn: 愿你的过去只是你前进步伐所踏出的声响，继续前行吧。
author: Fun., "Carry On"

txt_en: If you believe in yourself enough and know what you want, you're gonna make it happen.
txt_cn: 如果你足够自信，也知道自己想要什么，就一定会实现心中所想。
author: Mariah Carey, "Make It Happen"

txt_en: When you finally go back to your old hometown, you find it wasn't the old home you missed but your childhood.
txt_cn: 当你终于重归故里，你会发现自己思念的，不是故乡，而是童年。
author: Sam Ewing

txt_en: Sometimes a problem is just an opportunity in disguise.
txt_cn: 有时候问题不过是伪装起来的机会。
author: 《蛇蝎女佣》

txt_en: Life is short; the world is wide, and I want to make some memories.
txt_cn: 生命短暂，世界广阔，我想制造些回忆。
author: 《妈妈咪呀2》

txt_en: Whatever happens tomorrow, we've had today.
txt_cn: 不管明天会发生什么，至少我们拥有今天。
author: 《一天》

txt_en: How are you to imagine anything if the images are always provided for you?
txt_cn: 如果你能想到的东西都在眼前，你的思维又如何插上想象的翅膀呢？
author: 《超脱》

txt_en: It's strange. I felt less lonely when I didn't know you.
txt_cn: 真是奇怪。在认识你之前，我没有感到过如此孤单。
author: Jean-Paul Sartre

txt_en: Selfishness is not living as one wishes to live. It is asking others to live as one wishes to live.
txt_cn: 过自己想要的生活不是自私，要求别人按自己的意愿生活才是。
author: Oscar Wilde

txt_en: If you don't go after what you want, you'll never have it.
txt_cn: 不去追逐你所渴求的，你就永远也无法拥有它。
author: Nora Roberts

txt_en: Where we love is home, home that our feet may leave, but not our hearts.
txt_cn: 家，是爱之所在。也许我们脚步渐远，但心从未离开。
author: Oliver Wendell Holmes Sr.
